issues.message: ARIA attributes must conform to valid names

runnerExtras.description: Ensures attributes that begin with aria- are valid ARIA attributes

issues.message: This element has "position: fixed". This may require scrolling in two dimensions, which is considered a failure of this Success Criterion.
This element is absolutely positioned and the background color can not be determined. Ensure the contrast ratio between the text and all covered parts of the background are at least 3:1.
